name: Arc Shooter
description:
A fun One-Button shooter with a twist!

This is my first Unity project so any feedback would be much appreciated.
Directions: Press Space to shoot but be aware that ammo is limited and recharges with time.

This game is still in development. Sound affects, better graphics and performance optimisations will be implemented soon.  Thanks for playing!

Note: Game has been tested to work on Firefox & Safari browsers. Safari users might need to enable WebGL.
